entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @BlondeAnomalies I don’t think it is ok to say mean things like this. These people aren’t stupid, they are misinformed & don’t understand basic public health & disease progression. This makes me sad. I am watching my friends battle this illness, these people will suffer greatly & that is awful.
